hotswitcher.configGui.title: Hot Switcher Config
hotswitcher.configGui.swapBarCount.title: Swap Hot Bar Count
hotswitcher.configGui.swapBarCount.toolt: The number of inventory rows that should cycle position when the Swap Hotbar key is pressed. Default: 3
hotswitcher.configGui.swapSlotCount.tool: The number of inventory row slots that should cycle position in the active hotbar slot column when the Swap Slot key is pressed. Default: 1
hotswitcher.configGui.enableHotbarInCont: Make Hotbar Keybinds Usable in Containers

Enabling this allow you to change the active hotbar slot when a container is open. Both the scroll wheel and the hotbar keybinds should work, but if the keys would normally do something else in the container screen, then that will take precedence. Default: On
hotswitcher.load_message: To open open Hotswitcher configuration, type /hotswitcher or bind a key in keybindings.
